title: Rodrygo & Vini Jr. Dance On
description:
The FC crew discuss the racial abuse directed towards Vinicius Jr. from Atletico Madrid fans during the Madrid Derby and Rodrygo and Vinicius Jr. dancing after the opening goal. Plus, the panel debates whether Arsenal or Tottenham have gotten off to a hotter start in the premier league and go in-depth on Brazil's plethora of attacking options ahead of the World Cup.
